item.title: 谷歌在新图像生成模型中解决人工智能的拼写问题
item.description: 虽然人工智能助手在聊天回复中听起来很自信，但如果你要求它们生成一张包含多个文字短语的图片，那么生成的图片很可能会包含一些错别字或字体变形。【原文：As confident as artificial intelligence assistants can sound in chat responses, if you ask them to generate an image containing several text phrases, chances are the resulting imagery will contain some typos or distorted fonts.】

item.title: 受利率影响，美国 10 月现房销售创八个月新高
item.description: 10 月份，美国旧房销售量创下八个月来的最快增速，原因是在一些市场，买家利用较低的抵押贷款利率，抢占了卖家的先机。【原文：Sales of previously owned homes in the US rose at the fastest pace in eight months in October, as buyers took advantage of lower mortgage rates and gained the upper hand over sellers in some markets.】

item.title: 英伟达财报缓解人工智能泡沫担忧，美股反弹
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的季度收益强于预期，缓解了人们对人工智能股票价值可能被高估的担忧，周四美国股市飙升。【原文：US stocks soared on Thursday after stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings from Nvidia Corp. eased fears that AI stocks may have become overvalued.】

item.title: 任天堂和《战地 6》推动 10 月份美国游戏销量增长
item.description: 根据市场研究公司 Circana 的最新报告，电子艺界公司的《战地 6》只用了不到一个月的时间就成为今年美国最畅销的游戏。【原文：Electronic Arts Inc.’s Battlefield 6 needed less than a month to become this year’s best-selling game in the US, according to the latest report from market research firm Circana.】

item.title: 甲骨文 CDS 市场大爆发，人工智能崩溃的对冲方案应运而生
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ），这家曾经呆板的数据库巨头借贷了数百亿美元，并将自己的命运与人工智能的繁荣联系在一起，正迅速成为信贷市场人工智能风险的晴雨表。【原文：Oracle Corp., the once stodgy database giant that’s borrowed tens of billions and tethered its fortunes to the artificial intelligence boom, is quickly emerging as the credit market’s barometer for AI risk.】

item.title: 安大略省医疗保健养老金分支将借款 5 亿加元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安大略省医疗保健养老金计划（Healthcare of Ontario Pension Plan）的房地产融资机构 HOOPP Realty Finance 正寻求在首次债券发行中筹集多达 5 亿加元（约合 3.56 亿美元）的资金。【原文：HOOPP Realty Finance, the real estate financing arm of Healthcare of Ontario Pension Plan, is looking to raise as much as C$500 million ($356 million) in an inaugural bond offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Esentia 和 Holder 在墨西哥首次公开募股和配售中筹集 5.487 亿美元资金
item.description: 中游天然气公司 Esentia Energy Development 及其股东之一通过在墨西哥首次公开发行股票和私募融资 100.8 亿比索（约合 5.487 亿美元），该公司希望利用所谓的近岸化趋势。【原文：Midstream gas company Esentia Energy Development and one of its shareholders have raised 10.08 billion pesos ($548.7 million) through an initial public offering in Mexico and a private placement, as the firm looks to capitalize on the so-called nearshoring trend.】

item.title: 失业率上升后美国国债上涨
item.description: 在一份喜忧参半的就业报告使美联储下月降息的可能性得以保持后，国债上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained after a mixed jobs report kept the likelihood of a Federal Reserve rate cut next month alive.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称降息可能延长通胀时间并增加风险
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，为支持劳动力市场而降低利率可能会延长通胀高于目标的时间，并增加金融稳定风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said lowering interest rates to support the labor market could extend the period of above-target inflation and increase financial stability risks.】

item.title: 美国上周初请失业金人数降至 22 万
item.description: 上周，美国失业救济金申请人数下降到 22 万，表明尽管经济不稳定，但雇主在很大程度上仍在留住现有工人。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week to 220,000, indicating that employers are largely still holding onto current workers despite economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 9 月份雇主新增就业岗位 119,000 个，失业率上升
item.description: 美国 9 月份的就业增长有所加快，失业率有所上升，这表明劳动力市场在政府关门前出现了企稳迹象。【原文：US job growth picked up in September and the unemployment rate ticked higher, suggesting the labor market showed signs of stabilizing before the government shutdown.】

item.title: 美国关键就业数据公布前美元跃升至六个月高位
item.description: 在一份关键的就业报告公布之前，交易商降低了对美联储下月降息的预期，美元汇率指标升至六个月来的最高水平。【原文：A gauge of the dollar rose to its highest level in six months after traders reduced expectations of interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve next month in the run-up to a key jobs report.】

item.title: 降低通胀目标获认可后南非降息
item.description: 南非央行在正式通过 3% 的通胀目标后，下调了通胀预期，从而恢复了宽松周期。【原文：South Africa’s central bank resumed its easing cycle as it trimmed its inflation forecasts following the formal adoption of a 3% inflation target.】

item.title: 亚马逊和谷歌的智能家居摄像头很快将协同工作
item.description:
Matter 智能家居标准将很快允许混合和匹配摄像机。但亚马逊和谷歌会参与吗？【原文：

The Matter smart home standard will soon allow mixing and matching of video cameras. But will Amazon and Google take part?

】

item.title: 预测市场从边缘走向狂热，华尔街和硅谷纷纷涌入
item.description: 在纽约金融区 60 层楼上举行的这次亲密聚餐，汇聚了华尔街的支柱企业和年轻的加密货币新贵。【原文：The intimate meal, 60 floors above New York’s financial district, brought together a pillar of the Wall Street establishment and a young crypto upstart.】

item.title: 美国九月份就业报告
item.description: 求职者在北卡罗来纳州布恩的招聘会上。摄影师：Allison Joyce/Bloomberg【原文：Jobseekers at a job fair in Boone, North Carolina. Photographer: Allison Joyce/Bloomberg】

item.title: 加税、养老金和房地产：英国预算案看点
item.description: 下周的英国预算会有哪些内容，对您的资金有什么影响？【原文：What might be coming up in next week’s UK budget and what could it mean for your money?】

item.title: 威瑞森在削减成本运动中将非工会员工人数削减 20
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. announced wide-ranging layoffs Thursday morning that will shrink the company by as much as 20% of its non-union workforce, a major step in a turnaround plan led by new Chief Executive Officer Dan Schulman.】

item.title: 雅培将以 210 亿美元收购癌症筛查公司 Exact Sciences
item.description: 雅培实验室同意收购癌症筛查公司 Exact Sciences Corp.【原文：Abbott Laboratories agreed to acquire cancer-screening company Exact Sciences Corp., in a deal with a total equity value of about $21 billion.】

item.title: 化石燃料使用量创 9 个月新高，德国电价飙升
item.description: 由于天气寒冷、风力不足，德国化石燃料发电量达到近 9 个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Power generated from fossil fuels rose to the highest in almost 9 months in Germany as cold weather and weak wind levels strain supply.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚两个月内第二次利用欧洲债券市场
item.description: 哥伦比亚自 9 月份以来第二次利用欧元债券市场，为回购债务提供资金，这是哥伦比亚降低借贷成本的广泛战略的一部分。【原文：Colombia is tapping the market for eurobonds for the second time since September in order to help finance the buy-back of debt, part of a broad strategy to cut its borrowing costs.】

item.title: 美银美林称市场过早摒弃英国通胀风险
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师认为，投资者过于草率地抛弃了对英国通胀粘性的担忧。【原文：Investors have been too hasty in casting off concerns over the stickiness of UK inflation, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 石油交易商打赌特朗普对俄罗斯的新制裁不会生效
item.description: 充足的供应和对执行的怀疑削弱了美国限制措施对卢克石油公司和俄罗斯石油公司价格的影响。【原文：Ample supply and skepticism on enforcement blunt the price impact of US restrictions on Lukoil and Rosneft.】

item.title: 印度达成美国贸易协议后，印度央行称卢比将保持稳定
item.description: 印度储备银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，印度央行相信政府将很快与美国达成一项 "良好的 "贸易协议，这将缓解卢比的压力。【原文：India’s central bank is confident the government will soon clinch a “good” trade deal with the US, which should ease pressure on the rupee, the Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra said.】

item.title: Meta 的互联世界梦想在红海受阻
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Riley Griffin 报道 Meta 的 2Africa 水下电缆项目完工受阻的问题。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports on the issues stalling the completion of Meta’s 2Africa undersea cable project.】

item.title: Uber 与 Starship 合作，开始在欧洲提供机器人送货服务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. 将通过与 Starship 科技公司（Starship Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. will offer sidewalk robot deliveries in Europe for the first time through a new partnership with Starship Technologies Inc., starting with parts of the UK in December.】

item.title: 世界经济如何转向支离破碎的全球化
item.description: 虽然全球经济正在分化，但许多商业领域依然相互交织【原文：While the global economy is fragmenting, many areas of commerce remain intertwined】

item.title: 米莱伊不顾投资者呼吁增加阿根廷外汇储备
item.description: 尽管投资者的呼声很高，但阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱和他的顾问们对迅速建立储备、让比索浮动和放松货币管制犹豫不决。【原文：Despite a chorus of calls from investors, Argentine President Javier Milei and his advisers are hesitant to rapidly build reserves, let the peso float and relax currency controls.】

item.title: TCS 数据中心业务获 TPG 10 亿美元投资
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）在一份声明中说，该公司为其人工智能数据中心业务 HyperVault 从私募股权集团 TPG 募集了 10 亿美元。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services raised $1 billion from private equity group TPG for its AI data center business HyperVault, the firm said in a statement.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 因需求疲软和关税问题下调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: Bath & Body Works Inc.下调了全年业绩展望，称疲软的消费情绪损害了购物者的消费意愿，以及美国和其他国家征收关税的预期影响。【原文：Bath & Body Works Inc. cut its full-year outlook, saying weak consumer sentiment is hurting shoppers’ willingness to spend and the expected impact of tariffs imposed by the US and other countries.】
